mn110:3.1: Vassakāra asks the Buddha the same questions at [an4.187:2.1](), with an interesting example given from the court gossip.
mn110:4.1: See my note on AN 10.62 for this usage. Also, note that while PTS dict does not have bhatti in this sense, it surely, being from bhajati, has the same sense as asappurisasevana here. BB also translates thus.
